************************************

LSI Corp. MegaRAID Firmware Release 

************************************

Release date: 12/10/10

====================== 
Supported Controllers:
======================

MegaRAID SAS 9280-24i4e
MegaRAID SAS 9280-16i4e
MegaRAID SAS 9260-16i



Component:
=========
SAS MegaRAID Firmware Release for MegaRAID Controllers
Release date: 12/10/10


Version Numbers:	
===============
Current Firmware Package:  12.12.0-0037   
Current Package Details:   
APP-2.120.13-1094_BB-2.02.00.00-0000_BIOS-3.20.00_4.11.05.00_0x0418A000_WEBBIOS-6.0-32-e_27-Rel_PCLI-04.04-01700008_BOOT-01.250.04.219_NVDATA-2.09.03-0010_SAS2XFW-25.05.04.00_MFGIMG-25.05.04.00_2010_12_06
			     
Previous Firmware Package:  12.11.0-0017   
Previous Package Details:   
APP-2.110.03-0967_BB-2.02.00.00-0000_BIOS-3.18.00_4.09.05.00_0x0416A000_WEBBIOS-6.0-24-e_19-Rel_PCLI-04.04-01100008_BOOT-01.250.04.219_NVDATA-2.08.03-0004_SAS2XFW-25.05.04.00_MFGIMG-25.05.04.00_2010_08_06
		 
			      

Bug Fixes and Enhancements:
===========================
Firmware:
=========
Enhancements:
LSIP200119698 	(CO) 	BBU AEN Change for 6G SAS controllers
LSIP200110783 	(CO) 	Need ability to RESET expander from behind MegaSAS
LSIP200070114 	(CO) 	Enable OCR Support for iMR
LSIP200077653 	(CO) 	BMC to communicate with our firmware, using I2C interface
LSIP200083499 	(CO) 	Retry SATA IDNF
LSIP200083501 	(CO) 	Inconsistent drive mixing rules in the case of unsecured SED only DG
LSIP200083484 	(CO) 	Stage BIOS directly from flash - for iMR
LSIP200070054 	(CO) 	Implement mechanism for FW to obtain RAID driver version and provide in API
LSIP200077437 	(CO) 	Fast-Path-II: RAID-5 Write Optimizations
LSIP200063471 	(CO) 	Check internal backplane SES page for Backplane Bay ID and display in mgmt tools
LSIP200063465 	(CO) 	Sideband Management
LSIP200063425 	(CO) 	RAID fw should not run BGI on entire VD after capacity expansion
LSIP200063451 	(CO) 	Request to have VD offline, instead of PDs become foreign when PDs missing in spanned array
LSIP200063440 	(CO) 	Update I2C device locations for OEM controller and enable switch to access SEP
LSIP200075204 	(CO) 	RAID Firmware to read controller thermal sensors to get chip and board temps
LSIP200063435 	(CO) 	Modify NVData to make GPIO16 of OEM controller output activity LED for all 8 PHYs
LSIP200063446 	(CO) 	Monitor HDD temperature for all attached drives
LSIP200063459 	(CO) 	Support for variable rate HDDs

Bug Fixes:
==========
LSIP200085323 	(DFCT) 	Deliver Skinny Merge fixes
LSIP200119148 	(DFCT) 	Intermittent initialization failure (Fault code 0x01) SDRAM ReadEye calibration
LSIP200119150 	(DFCT) 	intermittent RAID key authentication issue was occurring on boot up
LSIP200119296 	(DFCT) 	Machine Check with specific motherboard.
LSIP200119390 	(DFCT) 	Tape Device  loads unexpectedly on Liberator and Falcon MR adapters
LSIP200119144 	(DFCT) 	2108 ROMB reports a non-functional Local Disk as "Operable"
LSIP200113822 	(DFCT) 	RAID-0 Volumes Disappeared After RAID Creation - intermittent
LSIP200119165 	(DFCT) 	Provide the chip version/revision for MegaRAID controllers thru MegaCLI
LSIP200113830 	(DFCT) 	Timeout happens in Electra + 600GB SAS HDD during the system power-on.
LSIP200113832 	(DFCT) 	FW causes Fatal Error when HSP drive responded with Sense 0x02 for Write/Verify or TUR.
LSIP200051941 	(DFCT) 	Some LED are still not working according to SPEC with latest NVDATA
LSIP200114320 	(DFCT) 	After a complete and successfully recalibrate cycle the request to a relearn is still on
LSIP200114335 	(DFCT) 	sas address not programmed correctly for OEM boards
LSIP200118870 	(DFCT) 	ESXi installation fails on RAID1/RAID0 cluster of two SSDs
LSIP200119312 	(DFCT) 	Disable VPD for specific SSVID 
LSIP200119340 	(DFCT) 	After FW downgrade eventlog cannot be read
LSIP200119397 	(DFCT) 	PL version 05.00.28.00 check in
LSIP200119135 	(DFCT) 	Field cant flash back from 10M08 to 10M04 successfully, requires Debugger
LSIP200119143 	(DFCT) 	Copy back does not start in a case of revertible HSP
LSIP200077733 	(DFCT) 	FW sets wrong state for the PD
LSIP200084868 	(DFCT) 	FW fails to alert multipath restoration
LSIP200095187 	(DFCT) 	Not able to change IO policy in Repo VD
LSIP200095594 	(DFCT) 	FW sets wrong state for the PD
LSIP200112601 	(DFCT) 	Test tool compare issue on R5 while running stress test and cable pull

LSIP200085281 	(DFCT) 	To resolve iMR build issues for

LSIP200094968 	(DFCT) 	MSM is not allowing to create a VD with all SSD PD in None Power save mode.
LSIP200095238 	(DFCT) 	On upgrade to 10m09 VD power save policy should be updated to CTRL DEFAULT

LSIP200071409 	(DFCT) 	When the PDs are in Transition state to create a config, rebooting the system shows no config present
LSIP200071372 	(DFCT) 	Snap Shot Rep Vd spins down when Repo and Base are both in the same DG.
LSIP200072625 	(DFCT) 	System is getting hang in BIOS, controller not responding
LSIP200071637 	(DFCT) 	Importing foreign config is affecting the Default PSpolicy of the DG
LSIP200072748 	(DFCT) 	SSCD fails to import with BAIL_OUT at line 1280
LSIP200072415 	(DFCT) 	Snap base fails to import when the Snap repo is cleared of garbage.
LSIP200073251 	(DFCT) 	(RW LSIP200071881) Snapshot is getting disable after reboot.
LSIP200073253 	(DFCT) 	SSD VD is also covered by SSCD
LSIP200072139 	(DFCT) 	Fw crashes when rebooted with spundown base vds.
LSIP200073606 	(DFCT) 	Dummy defect
LSIP200073811 	(DFCT) 	VDs going to Offline state with some of the PDs to failed state while mounting the VDs to OS through DiskManagement
LSIP200074361 	(DFCT) 	Snap DG goes offline and drives to foreing with IO failure upon OCR
LSIP200073953 	(DFCT) 	Changing the power policy from Max to None for DG when the DG goes spun down, DG is still going to Spun Down
LSIP200073998 	(DFCT) 	VD's are partially spinning Up.
LSIP200074399 	(DFCT) 	PD is going to foreign state instead of starting the copyback.
LSIP200074402 	(DFCT) 	Disabling powersave policy is not allowing to import foreign config which was created before disabling the power save
LSIP200074734 	(DFCT) 	Current Power save mode is showing as Auto for SSC or VD created using SSD
LSIP200071078 	(DFCT) 	MSM fails to change VD properties of a Snap Repository
LSIP200073602 	(DFCT) 	(RW LSIP200073251) (RW LSIP200071881) Snapshot is getting disable after reboot.
LSIP200075056 	(DFCT) 	Dummy defect
LSIP200075609 	(DFCT) 	Cannot create SSCD.
LSIP200075793 	(DFCT) 	Current PS policy of DG incorrect after reboot!!
LSIP200075226 	(DFCT) 	(RW LSIP200075056) Dummy defect
LSIP200054893 	(DFCT) 	(RW LSIP200054556) OEM support
LSIP200072062 	(DFCT) 	Change the DG PS policy from MAX to NONE for a selected DG, DG is still going to Spun down
LSIP200054894 	(DFCT) 	OEM Implementation
LSIP200053060 	(DFCT) 	Online Drives going to Powersave mode making BGI aborted.
LSIP200053151 	(DFCT) 	Operating system is getting Hung when Opeartion(rebuild) is going on.
LSIP200053333 	(DFCT) 	Online Drive is Spunning Down even when mfc field disablePowerSaving is set to 0x04 .
LSIP200053335 	(DFCT) 	Spun Down HotSpare is not Spunning Up if PetrolRead is started.
LSIP200053338 	(DFCT) 	Operating system is getting Hung when OS is ideal after HotSpares and Unconfigured Good Drives enters to SpunDown mode .
LSIP200053342 	(DFCT) 	Cannot create the configuration due to Error code 25 .
LSIP200053363 	(DFCT) 	Firmware breaks into mega mon when copy back is started .
LSIP200053450 	(DFCT) 	FW breaks to Megamon : Driver detected possible FW hang, halting FW.
LSIP200053469 	(DFCT) 	Spun drives do not spin up on creating config.
LSIP200053494 	(DFCT) 	Recon does not progress on when a spun down pd is added
LSIP200053652 	(DFCT) 	FirmWare throws continously (flush cache ar 0 is eligible for flush) while running IOs.
LSIP200054205 	(DFCT) 	FW breaks to megamon when running IO on large no. of Spun Down Drives
LSIP200054430 	(DFCT) 	FW allows to spin down Snapshot Repository
LSIP200054435 	(DFCT) 	Virtual Drives do not spin down after completion of Initialization.
LSIP200054658 	(DFCT) 	SAS & SATA Mix :Partial Virtual Drive is Spinng Up .
LSIP200054913 	(DFCT) 	HDD does not spin down in a VD with HDD SDD mix
LSIP200054914 	(DFCT) 	Drives from different enclosures do not spin up during Create VD
LSIP200054925 	(DFCT) 	VD is not going to powersavemode when there is a BGI happening on other VD.
LSIP200055041 	(DFCT) 	Rebuild does not starts wile IOs are running.
LSIP200055044 	(DFCT) 	IO`s stops after rebuild starts.
LSIP200053326 	(DFCT) 	Spun Down Hot Spare if kicking in rebuild , then the Hot Spare drive is not spunning up .
LSIP200053456 	(DFCT) 	FirmWare logs shows clearing of the configuration when No VDs are present .
LSIP200053497 	(DFCT) 	FirmWare log shows deletion of 64 VDs, even when 1 VD is been deleted.
LSIP200054657 	(DFCT) 	VD powerstate is oscillating between powersave and active without any i/os.
LSIP200057209 	(DFCT) 	FW breaks into megamon when online vd's are trying to spundown after I/O's terminated on the vd's
LSIP200057267 	(DFCT) 	Configured array is not changing to PS mode when there is a second Array created.
LSIP200062239 	(DFCT) 	Cannot Create Configuration after changing the spindown time of drives in controller property.
LSIP200063137 	(DFCT) 	Wrong PD state Transition shown while removing spin down drives
LSIP200064219 	(DFCT) 	WebBIOS: Can not set powersave properties for DG
LSIP200064587 	(DFCT) 	Can not create config Through Ctrl-R or MSM

LSIP200064217 	(DFCT) 	POwersaving property "DefaultPSPolicy" changing to 0xff

Pre-Boot CLI:
=============
Enhancements:
LSIP200063469 	(CO) 	Check internal backplane SES page for Backplane Bay ID and display in mgmt tools
LSIP200063457 	(CO) 	Support for variable rate HDDs
LSIP200075203 	(CO) 	RAID Firmware to read controller thermal sensors to get chip and board temps
LSIP200070634 	(CO) 	Customer requested these EFI:CLI commands are required for their testing
LSIP200073881 	(CO) 	Provide PCI bus and device id for a selected controller thru MegaCLI
LSIP200072376 	(CO) 	SWRAID. Develop CLI for uEFI 2.2

Bug Fixes:
LSIP200076197 	(DFCT) 	“No more interfaces” on executing most of the CLI command
LSIP200075420 	(DFCT) 	SWR: MegaDCli does not detect the PDs
LSIP200076437 	(DFCT) 	SWR5: Unable to create Raid 5 thru DCLI
LSIP200087722 	(DFCT) 	DCLI -After creating R5, we can’t delete the VD or clear the config.
LSIP200084490 	(DFCT) 	Porting 10M08 chnages to 10M09
LSIP200085665 	(DFCT) 	"MegaCli pdfwdownload" command is not flashing PD Firmware for Multiple PD's at a time.
LSIP200087720 	(DFCT) 	DCLI - Version Info showing wrong Date.
LSIP200085497 	(DFCT) 	SWR5: Cannot create config and clear config using EFI CLI
LSIP200087729 	(DFCT) 	DCLI/EFI CLI - "pdfwdownload" command is not exists in the help file of DCLI and EFI CLI.
LSIP200075421 	(DFCT) 	SWR: MegaDcli takes too much to execute command
LSIP200087724 	(DFCT) 	Intermittent issue seen while Clearing Configuraton through MegaCLI in RHEL 6 B2 64bit
LSIP200097535 	(DFCT) 	Dummy defect to update version of DCLI
LSIP200097793 	(DFCT) 	EFI Cli is displaying "Created VD0" even for 2nd VD
LSIP200097811 	(DFCT) 	To check in EFI CLI binary
LSIP200099360 	(DFCT) 	Porting 10M08 changes to 10M09 and 10M12
LSIP200082937 	(DFCT) 	Defect to merge DSW-3 code
LSIP200084314 	(DFCT) 	AutoDeleteOldestSnapshot doesn’t work in the CLI
LSIP200018606 	(DFCT) 	"./MegaCli64 adpeventlog getlatest n ax" fails when ldbi is running on the 9260
LSIP200018607 	(DFCT) 	Exagrid "./MegaCli64 adpeventlog getlatest n ax" fails when ldbi is running on the 84016
LSIP200086176 	(DFCT) 	Adding manufacturing page 8 programming support in CLI as part of PR LSIP200035454
LSIP200087587 	(DFCT) 	Defect to accomodate for non-availablity of DSW-3 feature on iMR controllers
LSIP200089369 	(DFCT) 	Incorrect Display View Mirror Infos for all VD's in Windows CLI
LSIP200096227 	(DFCT) 	By pressing Ctrl-Y(PCLI) in POST message, its going to megamon in fw and also not getting pcli command promot .
LSIP200096792 	(DFCT) 	CLI crashes when using "–snapshot –info" command on the repository VD
LSIP200097032 	(DFCT) 	CLI is allowing user to set MAXWITHCACHE ps policy for one of the OEM, which should actually be restricted
LSIP200085810 	(DFCT) 	MegaCli PdFwDownload output missing a dash
LSIP200089295 	(DFCT) 	-adpsettings command is not expecting "s" on end of "EnableLedHeaders" setting
LSIP200089930 	(DFCT) 	Junk character in the help message for “encinfo” command
LSIP200095273 	(DFCT) 	MegaCLI 8.00.30 crashed during a -adpallinfo command to a iMR controller.
LSIP200094773 	(DFCT) 	Changes for OEM
LSIP200076406 	(DFCT) 	CLI displays 'Stripe' size instead of displaying 'Strip' size in adpallinfo info page

WebBIOS:
========
Enhancements:
LSIP200063453 	(CO) 	Support for variable rate HDDs
LSIP200054947 	(CO) 	High Port Count controller onboard expander introduction
LSIP200075199 	(CO) 	RAID Firmware to read controller thermal sensors to get chip and board temps
LSIP200063441 	(CO) 	Monitor HDD temperature for all attached drives

Bug Fixes:
LSIP200084207 	(DFCT) 	Porting defect from 10M08 to 10M09
LSIP200086183 	(DFCT) 	Adv. Software Option list table it says Trial feature, same for Deactivate tab also. String changes required
LSIP200085177 	(DFCT) 	WebBIOS does not display the VDs in order
LSIP200094405 	(DFCT) 	(RW LSIP200056205) "Deactivate Trail Features" button is enabled though the trial features are not shown in WebBIOS
LSIP200088650 	(DFCT) 	WebBIOS is not allowing to break more than one DG at a time.
LSIP200089374 	(DFCT) 	WebBIOS: breaking the second mirror breaks first mirror
LSIP200088850 	(DFCT) 	WebBIOS: Fails to bring the broken arm as new VD
LSIP200094711 	(DFCT) 	WebBios not allowing to enable snapshot on a VD at the first go.
LSIP200094837 	(DFCT) 	Dummy defect for 10M09 PFK and break mirror hot keys.
LSIP200094921 	(DFCT) 	Available VD size shown wrong info after reconstruction finished on VD
LSIP200095230 	(DFCT) 	Join two broken Mirror with two different Join Mirror Tree is not working fine
LSIP200095339 	(DFCT) 	Unable to select multiple PD/VDs in the Webbios configuration wizard page through Keyboard and Mouse
LSIP200095350 	(DFCT) 	Dummy defect to port code from 10M08/10M06/10M04 streams.
LSIP200095349 	(DFCT) 	Unable to import Foreign Config using "Configuration 1" option in WebBios
LSIP200096461 	(DFCT) 	Option for Raid Reconstruction from R6 to R5 not available in the absence of unconfigured good PD
LSIP200096454 	(DFCT) 	End of dirve information page incorrect in webbios
LSIP200096749 	(DFCT) 	Dummy defect to port 10M08 changes to 10M09 stream.
LSIP200097138 	(DFCT) 	WebBIOS: Unable to set the powersave mode "None"
LSIP200097154 	(DFCT) 	Dummy defect to make changes for Dimmer switch NONE option.
LSIP200098562 	(DFCT) 	Dummy defect to revert back the changes for enhanced import.
LSIP200111071 	(DFCT) 	Porting defect "LSIP200061806 Array Size During Creation" from 10M04 train to 10M09 train
LSIP200088469 	(DFCT) 	spelling mistake in " Mega raid bios config utility join mirror-- chosse option" page
LSIP200089219 	(DFCT) 	WebBIOS: Unable to set the powersave mode "Controller defined"
LSIP200087590 	(DFCT) 	Webbios allowing to set Power saving setting for snapshot Repo Disk Group
LSIP200094970 	(DFCT) 	JBOD to unconfigured Drive conversion screen is not appearing in web bios
LSIP200095194 	(DFCT) 	the confirmation page which comes after breaking the mirror is not according to the UX
LSIP200095195 	(DFCT) 	in webbios "megaraid BIOS utility JoinMirror -choose option" page is not according to the UX.
LSIP200095207 	(DFCT) 	on selecting "bring the mirror arm as a new vd " will lead to confirmation page which is not acc to ux.
LSIP200095028 	(DFCT) 	once selecting the option to break mirror it can't be disabled using the keyboard.
LSIP200083598 	(DFCT) 	WEBBIOS: On "Manage MegaRAID Advanced Software Options" page shortcut key is not working.
LSIP200083595 	(DFCT) 	WEBBIOS: While activating Trail Features on Software Option Summary page information is missing.

BIOS:
=====
Enhancements:
LSIP200094540 	(CO) 	Support new API for getting memroy requirements for iMR
LSIP200113117 	(CO) 	(LSIP200111728) Long term fix for iMR SRAM space exhaustion

Bug Fixes:
LSIP200086954 	(DFCT) 	Errata Fix required in BIOS for the BT750 errata in Geimini/B0 chip
LSIP200083525 	(DFCT) 	Drake hang during PXE boot when QLogic QLE8152 10G FCoE card is installed.
LSIP200088215 	(DFCT) 	BIOS version 4.17/Failing on INT13 test when running a read after a write
LSIP200089634 	(DFCT) 	Dont hook INT15h if FW doesnt need host memory
LSIP200089645 	(DFCT) 	Enable CLP and perform workaround in that path
LSIP200094374 	(DFCT) 	Timeout if command didn't complete in three minutes
LSIP200089646 	(DFCT) 	Increase code size to 40k (currently it is 32k) as we need more code space for TB
LSIP200089522 	(DFCT) 	Storelibtest showing build version instead of build date in get controller info
LSIP200087295 	(DFCT) 	Controller hangs at post if you have three or more Milehigh enclosures connected to TB controller.(SHEA works)
LSIP200097644 	(DFCT) 	BIOS access variable which are no longer available to BIOS
LSIP200094519 	(DFCT) 	multiple boot does not work.
LSIP200099229 	(DFCT) 	Move PnP header from offset 70h to 0x74
LSIP200099238 	(DFCT) 	System hangs after BIOS POST is over on PCI 3.0 system
LSIP200099228 	(DFCT) 	User need to reboot system two times to boot to OS
LSIP200100054 	(DFCT) 	System hangs during OpROM POST in some systems
LSIP200098815 	(DFCT) 	OS won't boot with 16VDs on adapter0 and 64VDs on adapter1
LSIP200105680 	(DFCT) 	Montask when booting with 2 IMR controllers
LSIP200113055 	(DFCT) 	workaround FW handshkae: Increase timeout from 30 seconds to 120 seconds
LSIP200113247 	(DFCT) 	Adapter at Baseport is not responding after change OEM number and reboot
LSIP200106170 	(DFCT) 	9260-8i reports FW Dump message during BIOS initialization when user press CTL-H


Installation:
=============
Use MegaCLI to flash the SAS controllers.  MegaCLI can be downloaded from the support and download
section of www.lsi.com.

Command syntax:  MegaCli -adpfwflash -f mrhighpc.rom -a0
